common.tagline: Trusted Partner for All Your Shipments
common.description: PT Mitra Sahabat Logistik (MSL) is a company engaged in domestic and international freight forwarding services, based in Batam, Riau Islands. We are here as a logistics solution that is not only reliable and efficient, but also accessible and pleasant to work with.

loading.tagline: Trusted Partner for All Your Shipments

metadata.title: Home
metadata.description: Welcome to PT. Mitra Sahabat Logistik, your trusted partner for all your shipments. We provide domestic and international freight forwarding services from Batam.

hero.title: *Trusted* Domestic & International Logistics Solution
hero.subtitle: We are here as a logistics solution that is not only reliable and efficient, but also accessible and pleasant to work with. With extensive experience and network, we are here as your reliable logistics partner: fast, safe, and hassle-free.

services.title: Comprehensive Freight Forwarding Services
services.subtitle: From domestic to international shipping, we provide end-to-end logistics solutions tailored to your business needs.

items.title: Domestic Freight Forwarding - Land
items.shortDescription: Land shipping services throughout Indonesia with modern fleet and optimal routes for efficient and timely goods distribution.

items.title: Domestic Freight Forwarding - Sea
items.shortDescription: Domestic sea shipping services for large cargo with efficient costs and regular schedules to major Indonesian ports.

items.title: Domestic Freight Forwarding - Air
items.shortDescription: Domestic air shipping services for urgent goods with fastest transit time to all airports in Indonesia.

items.title: International Freight Forwarding - Import
items.shortDescription: Import services from worldwide with customs documentation, custom clearance, and delivery to final destination.

items.title: International Freight Forwarding - Export
items.shortDescription: Export services worldwide with export documentation, custom clearance, and coordination with international buyers.

items.title: Custom Clearance & Documentation
items.shortDescription: Customs documentation and custom clearance services that are fast, accurate, and compliant with latest regulations.

about.title: Trusted Partner for All Your Shipments
about.subtitle: PT. Mitra Sahabat Logistik is based in Batam, Riau Islands, engaged in domestic and international freight forwarding services. We are here as your reliable logistics partner with fast, safe, and hassle-free services.

contact.title: Ready to Serve Your Shipping Needs
contact.subtitle: Our expert team is ready to provide consultation and the best solutions for your business freight forwarding needs. Contact us now!
contact.form_subtitle: Get the best offer for your shipping needs
